oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-12-19 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 19, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performers the Jordanaires with Marijohn Wilkin and Millie Kirkham, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones and Ramona Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1054th broadcast, and the 21st Christmas show.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Archie Campbell; Grandpa Jones; Jordanaires; Marijohn Wilkin; Millie Kirkham; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces George Morgan -- Santa Claus Is Coming To Town (George Morgan) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- Grant Turner introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Grandpa Jones, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces the Jordanaires -- Go Tell It On The Mountain (Jordanaires, Marijohn Wilkin, Millie Kirkham) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- Grant Turner introduces Tommy Jackson -- Tom And Jerry (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Grant Turner and George Morgan talk -- I'll Be Home For Christmas (George Morgan) -- Grant Turner introduces Chet Atkins -- Deck The Halls / O Little Town Of Bethlehem (medley) (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
